ARABIC: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Again! What will convey to you what the Day of Judgement is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: How then can you comprehend what the Day of Judgement is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Again, what do you know what the Day of Recompense is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Again would that you only knew how terrible it really is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Again, what do you know – of what sort is the Day of Justice!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Again, what will make you know what the Day of Recompense is
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Again, what will make you realize what the day of judgment is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Again, what shall teach thee what is the Day of Doom?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Again, what will convey unto thee what the Day of Judgment is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Again: what will make you realize what the Day of Judgement will be?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Again, what shall make thee know whatsoever the Day of Requital is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Again, what will show you what is the Day of Retribution?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Again, what will explain to thee what the Day of Judgment is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Again, what will make you know what the Day of Recompense is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Again, what could let you know what the Day of Recompense is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then again, what will convey to you what the Day of Justice is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then, what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [82:18] Again, what would show you what the Day of Judgement is? — [repeated] to emphasise its enormity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (what the Day of Judgement is!) what the Day of Reckoning is. He said this to arouse his astonishment, in order to magnify such a Day.
